MCP9808

This is a test description

  • Device addresses: 24, 25, 26, 27, 28, 29, 30, 31
  • Address type 7-bit

Addr 1

16-bytes

TUPPER and TLOWER Limit Hysteresis bits

This bit can not be altered when either of the Lock bits are set (bit 6 and bit 7). This bit can be programmed in Shutdown mode.

[10:9] | 2-bytes
Read-only

Shutdown Mode bit

In shutdown, all power-consuming activities are disabled, though all registers can be written to or read. This bit cannot be set to ‘1’ when either of the Lock bits is set (bit 6 and bit 7). However, it can be cleared to ‘0’ for continuous conversion while locked.

[8:8] | 1-byte
Read-only
